@goshujini99a I think I get off to NTR because the girl is so hot. I can't get off to NTR when the girl is ugly. It has to be a hot girl fucking a hot guy; that's what I want - If the guy is not hot, then that's also a turn off. I want the girl to get what she deserves; she should get a guy as hot as she is herself. So I'm getting off to the fact that justice is served - that a hot girl isn't fucking an ugly bastard, but someone whom she deserves. But why do I put myself in the position of the cuck? Because I know I am not as hot as the guy she is fucking (I was a very unconfident guy when going to school) but to think that I am the boyfriend of such a hot girl turns me on so much. It is sad though to see NTR stories end with the girl leaving the guy, so I prefer netorase, since the girl stays with the guy.
